text: Our friend Shashi from Intel is here today w/ some Edison boards & sensors. We were going to meet with him and some of his colleagues at 11:30 if anyone wants to join. Also lunch afterwards.
Come find me or Danielle if you want to join

[cocoa / ios] The short answer to "can I mix transforms and NSLayoutConstraints on my view?" is no. Some views get layout constraints, some views get laid out manually. But it's not that hard to accomplish. More here <http://oleb.net/blog/2014/03/how-i-learned-to-stop-worrying-and-love-auto-layout/>

attachments.text: I made my peace with Cocoa Auto Layout as soon as I realized how easy it is to mix with manual layout code.
attachments.fallback: I made my peace with Cocoa Auto Layout as soon as I realized how easy it is to mix with manual layout code.

text: oh, and if your storyboard is complaining that not all your views have layout constraints, you can set some up that will be removed at build time! <https://www.dropbox.com/s/kibdrrn7j18rm6c/Screenshot%202014-11-21%2016.57.57.png>
